books.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.description: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien. The Lord of the Rings is one of the best-selling novels ever written, with over 150 million copies sold

books.title: Harry Potter and The Philosophers Stone
